means: 无盖的，无眼睑的，注视着

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... lidar 激光雷达 lidless 无盖的 lie about 点缀.

means.word_mean: 1. not having or covered with a lid or lids;
3. without having the eyes closed or covered by the eyelids;

sentences.sentence: "to an eye like mine, a lidless watcher of the public weal"- Alfred Tennyson

auth_sentence.content: He turned it over, and I could see a massive, lidless eye staring out at us.
auth_sentence.res_content: He turned it over, and I could see a massive, lidless eye staring out at us.
